JOIN OUR CHAT The future of care: Is your virtual care strategy meeting employee expectations?
April 26 | 2:00 PM Eastern Image Businessman using tablet Consumer expectations of healthcare have changed. In fact, ninety-one percent of adults who have used virtual care would do so again in the future, instead of an in-person visit. 1 Is your organization optimizing its virtual care strategy to meet employee expectations?
Join Stephanie DeLorm, Senior Vice President of Health Solutions at Aon, and Kim Lafontana, Senior Vice President of Solutions Strategy at Teladoc Health, as they sit down to discuss redesigning care delivery that unlocks the full potential of virtual care to keep employees happy and healthy—today, tomorrow and beyond.
Register now <[[https://www.benefitnews.com/web-seminars/the-future-of-care-is-your-virtual-care-strategy-meeting-employee-expectations?utm_source=dg_teladochealth&utm_medium=webseminar&utm_campaign=dg_ebn_teladochealth_webseminar_04262022]]>
Topics will include: Ever-changing consumer expectations and how to meet them Retaining top talent with better benefits How virtual care creates greater health equity Integrated, long-term solutions for whole-person care
Speakers
Stephanie DeLorm Senior Vice President, Health Solutions Aon
Kim Lafontana Senior Vice President, Solutions Strategy Teladoc Health 1 Virtual Care Transformation Study of Large Employers, Teladoc Health, 2021
